index.title: Ask Picture with Free AI !
index.subtitle: Upload your image, and let AI extract the information within it. 'AskPic' provides comprehensive insights from every angle of your pictures. Experience it today!
index.note: As this is an early test version, some functions may not be stable. We appreciate your patience and understanding. If you encounter any problems or have any suggestions, please feel free to contact us. Your feedback is valuable to us and will help us improve the tool.
index.func_text_placeholder: Information of the picture generated by AI Agents.
index.fqa_answer_1: Ask Pic is an AI tool that provides detailed descriptions of images. It analyzes image content to offer insights into emotions, data charts, and creation backgrounds.
index.fqa_ask_2: How to get the description of an image?
index.fqa_answer_2: To begin, select an image from your device or paste one directly into the upload area, and then choose a sample prompt or enter a question about the image. Click the "Describe Image" button, and the AI tool will automatically analyze your image to generate a description.
index.fqa_ask_3: Is Ask Pic free to use?
index.fqa_answer_3: Yes, Image Describer offers a free tier that allows you to generate image descriptions for up to 3 images per day without needing to log in.
index.fqa_ask_4: What types of images can I use with Ask Pic?
index.fqa_answer_4: We support common formats such as WEBP, JPG, and PNG.
index.fqa_note_label: Can’t find the answer you’re looking for? Reach out to our
index.public_label: I agree to publicly display this content on askpic.com.

about.about_description: Welcome to our AI image interpretation tool website! Here is a Image Describer tool dedicated to providing users with accurate and thorough image content interpretation services. Our tool can perform detailed analysis on the works you upload, whether they are paintings, photographs, or other forms of images. With the support of the large-model language ability, AI can deeply analyze the content, background, and expressed ideas of the works, helping you better understand the connotation of the works and explore the hidden meanings. During the use of our tool, if you have any opinions or suggestions, or encounter any problems, please feel free to contact us through our email. Every piece of feedback is the driving force for us to improve our services. We will do our best to answer your questions and continuously optimize our tool to provide more high-quality and convenient services. Thank you for choosing our AI image interpretation tool website, and we look forward to exploring the mysteries of the image world with you!
about.contact_description: If you have any questions or comments, please feel free to contact me.

pricing.title: AI Image Description Generator Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose a plan to buy credits, Unleash your creativity with AI Image Description Generator.
pricing.pricing_description: Image description generation utilizes a credit-based system, with each image requiring 1 credit.
